How It Works

Outgoing SMS

We will be sending your SMS to different countries: UK, Latvia, Taiwan will be sending your SMS to different countries: UK, Latvia, Taiwan

Check if your mobile plan includes SMS outside of your country

Incoming SMS

What is incoming sms?

We will send you SMS with random text and numbers. If you receive these SMS. it means that the SMS channel is working perfectly fine on your end

Incoming SMS

What is incoming sms?

We will send you SMS with random text and numbers. If you receive these SMS. it means that the SMS channel is working perfectly fine on your end

Outgoing SMS

We will be sending your SMS to different countries: UK, Latvia, Taiwan

I have recommended this app to all of my friends and family. Keep up the good work.

A

Duke Durham

Jan 20, 2021

his has to be one of my favorite money making apps. It's fast, easy to use, has a low payout threshold, and quickly pays out to your PayPal account. I have had the app for about a month and have withdrawn 5 times and received the automatic monthly payment 1 time, for a total of 6 payouts. As for people complaining about it "taking their money" the app clearly states when you are setting it up that it uses intl text credits, if you don't have intl unlimited plan I wouldn't recommend using it.

Questions
& Answers

What is the main goal of Cash4SMS?

The main goal of Cash4SMS is to help mobile users get the most value out of their mobile plans by allowing them to sell their unused SMS messages.

Which mobile operating systems does Cash4SMS support?

The main goal of Cash4SMS is to help mobile users get the most value out of their mobile plans by allowing them to sell their unused SMS messages.
